title: Column icons don't show up in connecting derby database
OB: When connecting to a derby database, the column icons are not displayed.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source to connect to a derby database using the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Data Set window, select Query. 6. (Additional details needed - please specify what action should be performed in the query editor to encounter the issue.)
